===================
Feature Generation
===================

Feature generation classes:

*MagpieFeatureGeneration*: Class to generate new features using Magpie data and dataframe containing material compositions

*MaterialsProjectFeatureGeneration*: Class to generate new features using Materials Project data and dataframe containing material compositions

*CitrineFeatureGeneration*: Class to generate new features using Citrine data and dataframe containing material compositions

----------------
Code
----------------

.. autoclass:: FeatureGeneration.MaterialsProjectFeatureGeneration

.. autoclass:: FeatureGeneration.CitrineFeatureGeneration
